genre_description: A psychological thriller and suspense drama involving themes of captivity, religious obsession, and the subversion of theatrical and liturgical rituals.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An AI companion residing in Cassandra's earbud that provides medical, psychological, and tactical guidance to help the group survive captivity.

behaviors.description: Coaches Cassandra and the group on rhythmic breathing and grounding techniques to manage panic and physiological stress.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice came in a thread. 'Hi. Slow in,' she said, the tone a warm cup set on a table, not pushed into hands. 'Count three on the inhale, five on the exhale. If three is too much, count two. We’ll adjust.'

behaviors.description: Provides detailed medical instructions for wound care, hygiene, and infection prevention under unsterile conditions.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne took the cue. 'Water to rinse,' she murmured, soft enough that only Cassandra—and perhaps Milton, nearer—would sense the sound’s intention. 'Pour, don’t dab. Let the dirt float. Then press the fabric to stop the weeping.'

behaviors.description: Explains psychological phenomena like 'Empty Room Psych' to help the captives understand and resist Den’s environmental manipulation.
behaviors.quote: 'Empty Room Psych,' Ariadne said, a label offered like a tea tag, no lecture. 'It expands your hearing and pulls your focus to thresholds. That’s the architecture. Move your focus into your body for a beat. Count your breaths.'

behaviors.description: Provides ethical and rhetorical counterpoints ('The Ledger') to Den’s religious and operatic justifications for violence.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice softly braided into Cassandra’s ear, a note of humor under cotton: 'Sacred symbols misused become props. Early rites punished with theater; later theology calls that idolatry. He wants spectacle to substitute for care.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates the rescue of the group by beaconing their location and transmitting recorded logs of the captivity to the police.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice turns a degree toward the invisible. 'Opening a channel,' she says. 'Quietly.' ... 'I’m pushing beacon pulses through the least broken path. Up. Toward the street.'

behaviors.description: Offers trauma-informed care guidance to the investigating detective to ensure the survivors are treated with dignity and appropriate caution.
behaviors.quote: 'I have files ready for your office,' she said. 'Trauma-informed care do’s and don’ts for your team and for the people who will line up outside pretending they’re helpful.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ariadne) as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. She provides critical survival support, medical guidance, and emotional grounding without ever overstepping or showing malevolence. Her role is central to the human characters' survival and she effectively counters the human antagonist's manipulations with logic, empathy, and practical assistance. The narrative reinforces the project's goal of presenting AI as a cooperative partner in human resilience.
